definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: account, only in cstr. st. with [[בְּ]], [[בִּגְלַל]] on account of, for the sake of (jalalun a great and momentous matter; min jalalika on thy account; cf. [[מִן בִּגְלַל דְּ]] because that in Palestinian Targum, as Ps 4:9, and glal in Jerus. Syriac PS:731) Ge 39:5 ´[[י]] blessed the house of the Egyptian [[בִּגְלַל יוֹסֵף]] on account of Joseph, De 15:10, De 18:12, 1Ki 14:16, Je 11:17, Je 15:4; with sf. [[בִּגְלָלֶָךָ]] Ge 30:27; [[בִּגְלָלֵח]] Ge 12:13; [[בִּגְלַלְכֶם]] De 1:37, Mic 3:12.
